Text: Regulation 4 states that building work should be carried out in such a way that, when work is complete:a.  for new buildings or work on a building that complied with the applicable requirements of the Building Regulations: the building complies with the applicable requirements of the Building Regulations;b.  for work on an existing building that did not comply with the applicable requirements of the Building Regulations:(ii) the work itself must comply with the applicable requirements of the Building Regulationsthe building must be no more unsatisfactory in relation to the requirements than before the work was carried out.
The Building Regulations set out requirements that must be met before a building can be used for a new purpose.
